title.rendered: TTE FM at IRECMS Panel Discussion

content.rendered:
Marc Daly, Vice President, of TTE Facilities Management was part of a panel discussion at the recently concluded IRECMS event conducted by the World Realty Congress. The discussion was on “The Power of Data and Tech for Productivity and Sustainability” where insights were shared on the transformative impact of technology in real estate and how facilities management firms are leveraging it.

Marc spoke about the key focus areas where TTE Facilities Management uses data to drive exemplary engineering driven solutions for our Facilities Management and Asset Retrofit services. There was also an in-depth discussion on the strong ESG engagement TTE FM has with our clients during the development, execution, and reporting phases of their ESG journey. We strongly advocate accurate data utilization alongside industry standard ESG principles to drive efficiencies in asset performance and service delivery.
